content.content: <IfModule mod_rewrite.c> RewriteEngine On RewriteCond %{HTTPS} off RewriteRule (.*) https://%{HTTP_HOST}%{REQUEST_URI} [R=301,L] </IfModule>

# Rewrite application „::APP_NAME::“ (WCF 1.1) @ ::APP_DIR:: RewriteCond %{QUERY_STRING} page=User&userID=([0-9]+) RewriteRule ^::OLD_APP_DIR::index\.php$ ::APP_DIR::index.php?user/%1/ [R=301,L] RewriteCond %{QUERY_STRING} page=Thread&threadID=([0-9]+)&action=lastPost RewriteRule ^::OLD_APP_DIR::index\.php$ ::APP_DIR::index.php?thread/%1/&action=lastPost [R=301,L] RewriteCond %{QUERY_STRING} page=Thread&threadID=([0-9]+)&action=firstNew RewriteRule ^::OLD_APP_DIR::index\.php$ ::APP_DIR::index.php?thread/%1/&action=firstNew [R=301,L] RewriteCond %{QUERY_STRING} page=Thread&postID=([0-9]+) RewriteRule ^::OLD_APP_DIR::index\.php$ ::APP_DIR::index.php?thread/thread/&postID=%1#post%1 [NE,R=301,L] RewriteCond %{QUERY_STRING} page=Thread&postID=([0-9]+)#post([0-9]+) RewriteRule ^::OLD_APP_DIR::index\.php$ ::APP_DIR::index.php?thread/thread/&postID=%1#post%1 [NE,R=301,L] RewriteCond %{QUERY_STRING} page=Thread&threadID=([0-9]+)&pageNo=([0-9]+) RewriteRule ^::OLD_APP_DIR::index\.php$ ::APP_DIR::index.php?thread/%1/&pageNo=%2 [R=301,L] RewriteCond %{QUERY_STRING} page=Thread&threadID=([0-9]+) RewriteRule ^::OLD_APP_DIR::index\.php$ ::APP_DIR::index.php?thread/%1/ [R=301,L] RewriteCond %{QUERY_STRING} page=Board&boardID=([0-9]+)&pageNo=([0-9]+) RewriteRule ^::OLD_APP_DIR::index\.php$ ::APP_DIR::index.php?board/%1/&pageNo=%2 [R=301,L] RewriteCond %{QUERY_STRING} page=Board&boardID=([0-9]+) RewriteRule ^::OLD_APP_DIR::index\.php$ ::APP_DIR::index.php?board/%1/ [R=301,L] RewriteCond %{QUERY_STRING} page=Attachment&attachmentID=([0-9]+) RewriteRule ^::OLD_APP_DIR::index\.php$ ::APP_DIR::index.php?attachment/%1/ [R=301,L] RewriteCond %{QUERY_STRING} page=Index RewriteRule ^::OLD_APP_DIR::index\.php$ ::APP_DIR::index.php?board-list/ [R=301,L] RewriteCond %{QUERY_STRING} page=Portal RewriteRule ^::OLD_APP_DIR::index\.php$ index.php?dashboard/ [R=301,L]

# Rewrite application „::APP_NAME::“ (WCF 1.1) @ ::APP_DIR:: RewriteCond %{QUERY_STRING} page=UserBlogOverview RewriteRule ^::OLD_APP_DIR::index\.php$ ::APP_DIR:: [R=301,L] RewriteCond %{QUERY_STRING} page=UserBlogEntry&entryID=([0-9]+) RewriteRule ^::OLD_APP_DIR::index\.php$ ::APP_DIR::index.php?entry/%1/ [R=301,L] RewriteCond %{QUERY_STRING} page=UserBlog&userID=([0-9]+)&categoryID=([0-9]+) RewriteRule ^::OLD_APP_DIR::index\.php$ ::APP_DIR::index.php?entry-list/&userID=%1 [R=301,L] RewriteCond %{QUERY_STRING} page=UserBlogOverview&categoryID=([0-9]+) RewriteRule ^::OLD_APP_DIR::index\.php$ ::APP_DIR::index.php?entry-list/%1/ [R=301,L] RewriteCond %{QUERY_STRING} page=UserBlog&userID=([0-9]+) RewriteRule ^::OLD_APP_DIR::index\.php$ ::APP_DIR::index.php?entry-list/&userID=%1 [R=301,L]

# Rewrite application „::APP_NAME::“ (WCF 1.1) @ ::APP_DIR:: RewriteCond %{QUERY_STRING} page=UserGalleryOverview RewriteRule ^::OLD_APP_DIR::index\.php$ ::APP_DIR:: [R=301,L] RewriteCond %{QUERY_STRING} page=UserGalleryAlbumList&userID=([0-9]+) RewriteRule ^::OLD_APP_DIR::index\.php$ ::APP_DIR::index.php?album/%1/ [R=301,L] RewriteCond %{QUERY_STRING} page=UserGalleryPhotos&userID=([0-9]+) RewriteRule ^::OLD_APP_DIR::index\.php$ ::APP_DIR::index.php?user-image-ist/%1/ [R=301,L] RewriteCond %{QUERY_STRING} page=UserGalleryPhoto&photoID=([0-9]+) RewriteRule ^::OLD_APP_DIR::index\.php$ ::APP_DIR::index.php?image/%1/ [R=301,L]

# Rewrite application „::APP_NAME::“ (WCF 1.1) @ ::APP_DIR:: RewriteCond %{QUERY_STRING} page=CalendarMonth RewriteRule ^::OLD_APP_DIR::index\.php$ ::APP_DIR:: [R=301,L] RewriteCond %{QUERY_STRING} page=CalendarWeek RewriteRule ^::OLD_APP_DIR::index\.php$ ::APP_DIR::index.php?weekly/ [R=301,L] RewriteCond %{QUERY_STRING} page=CalendarEvent&eventID=([0-9]+) RewriteRule ^::OLD_APP_DIR::index\.php$ ::APP_DIR::index.php?event/%1/ [R=301,L]

# Burning Board 3 RewriteRule ^::OLD_APP_DIR::(board[0-9]+\-[^/\.]+/)*board([0-9]+)\-([^/\.]+)/([0-9]+)\-([^/\.]*)/last\-post\.html$ ::APP_DIR::index.php?thread/$4-$5/&action=lastPost [R=301,QSA,L] RewriteRule ^::OLD_APP_DIR::(board[0-9]+\-[^/\.]+/)*board([0-9]+)\-([^/\.]+)/([0-9]+)\-([^/\.]*)/first\-new\-post\.html$ ::APP_DIR::index.php?thread/$4-$5/&action=firstNew [R=301,QSA,L] RewriteRule ^::OLD_APP_DIR::(board[0-9]+\-[^/\.]+/)*board([0-9]+)\-([^/\.]+)/p([0-9]+)\-([^/\.]*)/?$ ::APP_DIR::index.php?thread/&postID=$4#post$4 [R=301,QSA,L] RewriteRule ^::OLD_APP_DIR::(board[0-9]+\-[^/\.]+/)*board([0-9]+)\-([^/\.]+)/([0-9]+)\-([^/\.]*)/index([0-9]+)\.html$ ::APP_DIR::index.php?thread/$4-$5/&pageNo=$6 [R=301,QSA,L] RewriteRule ^::OLD_APP_DIR::(board[0-9]+\-[^/\.]+/)*board([0-9]+)\-([^/\.]+)/([0-9]+)\-([^/\.]*)/?$ ::APP_DIR::index.php?thread/$4-$5/ [R=301,QSA,L] RewriteRule ^::OLD_APP_DIR::(board[0-9]+\-[^/\.]+/)*board([0-9]+)\-([^/\.]+)/index([0-9]+)\.html$ ::APP_DIR::index.php?board/$2-$3/&pageNo=$4 [R=301,QSA,L] RewriteRule ^::OLD_APP_DIR::(board[0-9]+\-[^/\.]+/)*board([0-9]+)\-([^/\.]+)/?$ ::APP_DIR::index.php?board/$2/ [R=301,QSA,L]
#TODO: wcf RewriteRule ^::OLD_APP_DIR::user/([0-9]+)\-([^/\.]*)/?$ ::WSC_DIR::/index.php/user/$1-$2/ [R=301,QSA,L] RewriteCond %{QUERY_STRING} page=Attachment&attachmentID=([0-9]+) RewriteRule ^::OLD_APP_DIR::index\.php$ ::WSC_DIR::/index.php?attachment/%1/ [R=301,QSA,L]

# Community Blog 1 RewriteRule ^::OLD_APP_DIR::user/blog([0-9]+)\-([^/\.]*)/entry([0-9]+)\-([^/\.]*)/?$ ::APP_DIR::index.php?entry/$3-$4/ [R=301,QSA,L] RewriteRule ^::OLD_APP_DIR::user/blog([0-9]+)\-([^/\.]*)/category([0-9]+)\-([^/\.]*)/?$ ::APP_DIR::index.php?entry-list/&userID=$1 [R=301,QSA,L] RewriteRule ^::OLD_APP_DIR::blog/category([0-9]+)\-([^/\.]*)/?$ ::APP_DIR::index.php??entry-list/$1/ [R=301,QSA,L] RewriteRule ^::OLD_APP_DIR::user/blog([0-9]+)\-([^/\.]*)/?$ ::APP_DIR::index.php?entry-list/&userID=$1 [R=301,QSA,L] RewriteCond %{QUERY_STRING} page=UserBlogOverview RewriteRule ^::OLD_APP_DIR::index\.php$ /blog/ [R=301,QSA,L]

# Community Gallery 1 RewriteRule ^::OLD_APP_DIR::user/gallery([0-9]+)/([^/\.]*)/photo([0-9]+)/([^/\.]*)/?$ ::APP_DIR::index.php?image/$3-$4/ [R=301,QSA,L] RewriteRule ^::OLD_APP_DIR::user/gallery([0-9]+)/([^/\.]*)/album([0-9]+)/([^/\.]*)/?$ ::APP_DIR::index.php/Album/$3-$4/ [R=301,QSA,L] RewriteRule ^::OLD_APP_DIR::gallery/category([0-9]+)/([^/\.]*)/?$ ::APP_DIR::index.php?image-list/$1-$2/ [R=301,QSA,L] RewriteRule ^::OLD_APP_DIR::user/gallery([0-9]+)/([^/\.]*)/?$ ::APP_DIR::index.php?image/$3-$4/ [R=301,QSA,L] RewriteCond %{QUERY_STRING} page=UserGalleryOverview RewriteRule ^::OLD_APP_DIR::index\.php$ /gallery/ [R=301,QSA,L] RewriteCond %{QUERY_STRING} page=UserGalleryAlbumList&userID=([0-9]+) RewriteRule ^::OLD_APP_DIR::index\.php$ ::APP_DIR::index.php?album-list/%1/ [R=301,QSA,L] RewriteCond %{QUERY_STRING} page=UserGalleryPhotos&userID=([0-9]+) RewriteRule ^::OLD_APP_DIR::index\.php$ ::APP_DIR::index.php?user-image-list/%1/ [R=301,QSA,L]

#phpBB 3.x #Posts RewriteCond %{QUERY_STRING} ^p=([0-9]+).*$ RewriteRule ^::OLD_APP_DIR::viewtopic\.php$ ::APP_DIR::index.php?thread/&postID=%1#post%1 [R=301,L] #Forums RewriteCond %{QUERY_STRING} ^f=([0-9]+).*$ RewriteRule ^::OLD_APP_DIR::viewforum\.php$ ::APP_DIR::index.php?board/%1/ [R=301,L] #Threads RewriteCond %{QUERY_STRING} ^f=([0-9]+)&t=([0-9]+).*$ RewriteRule ^::OLD_APP_DIR::viewtopic\.php$ ::APP_DIR::index.php?thread/%2/ [R=301,L] RewriteCond %{QUERY_STRING} ^t=([0-9]+).*$ RewriteRule ^::OLD_APP_DIR::viewtopic\.php$ ::APP_DIR::index.php?thread/%1/ [R=301,L] #Profiles RewriteCond %{QUERY_STRING} ^mode=viewprofile&u=([0-9]+).*$ RewriteRule ^::OLD_APP_DIR::memberlist\.php$ ::APP_DIR::index.php?user/%1/ [R=301,L]

#vBulletin 3.x/4.x RewriteCond %{QUERY_STRING} ^f=([0-9]+)$ RewriteRule ^::OLD_APP_DIR::forumdisplay\.php$ ::APP_DIR::index.php?board/%1/ [R=301,L] RewriteCond %{QUERY_STRING} ^p=([0-9]+)$ RewriteRule ^::OLD_APP_DIR::showthread\.php$ ::APP_DIR::index.php?thread/postID=%1#post%1/ [R=301,L] RewriteCond %{QUERY_STRING} ^p=([0-9]+)#post([0-9]+)$ RewriteRule ^::OLD_APP_DIR::showthread\.php$ ::APP_DIR::index.php?thread/postID=%1#post%2/ [R=301,L] RewriteCond %{QUERY_STRING} ^([0-9]+)-([^/\.]+)&goto=newpost$ RewriteRule ^::OLD_APP_DIR::showthread\.php$ ::APP_DIR::index.php?thread/%1-%2/&action=firstNew [R=301,L] RewriteCond %{QUERY_STRING} ^t=([0-9]+)$ RewriteRule ^::OLD_APP_DIR::showthread\.php$ ::APP_DIR::index.php?thread/%1/ [R=301,L] RewriteCond %{QUERY_STRING} ^t=([0-9]+)&s=(.*)$ RewriteRule ^::OLD_APP_DIR::showthread\.php$ ::APP_DIR::index.php?thread/%1/ [R=301,L] RewriteCond %{QUERY_STRING} ^t=([0-9]+)&langid=([0-9]+)$ RewriteRule ^::OLD_APP_DIR::showthread\.php$ ::APP_DIR::index.php?thread/%1/ [R=301,L] RewriteCond %{QUERY_STRING} ^t=([0-9]+)&p=([0-9]+)$ RewriteRule ^::OLD_APP_DIR::showthread\.php$ ::APP_DIR::index.php?thread/%1-%2/&postID=%3#post%3 [R=301,L] RewriteCond %{QUERY_STRING} ^t=([0-9]+)&page=([0-9]+)$ RewriteRule ^::OLD_APP_DIR::showthread\.php$ ::APP_DIR::index.php?thread/%1/&pageNo=%2 [R=301,L] RewriteCond %{QUERY_STRING} ^t=([0-9]+)&page=([0-9]+)&langid=([0-9]+)$ RewriteRule ^::OLD_APP_DIR::showthread\.php$ ::APP_DIR::index.php?thread/%1/&pageNo=%2 [R=301,L] RewriteCond %{QUERY_STRING} ^attachmentid=([0-9]+)&d=([0-9]+)$ RewriteRule ^::OLD_APP_DIR::attachment\.php$ ::APP_DIR::index.php?attachment/%1/ [R=301,L] RewriteCond %{QUERY_STRING} ^p=([0-9]+)&postcount=([0-9]+)$ RewriteRule ^::OLD_APP_DIR::showpost\.php$ ::APP_DIR::index.php?thread/&postID=%1#post%1 [R=301,L] RewriteCond %{QUERY_STRING} ^do=getnew&contenttype=vBForum_Post$ RewriteRule ^::OLD_APP_DIR::search\.php$ ::APP_DIR::index.php?board-quick-search/&mode=unreadPosts [R=301,L] RewriteRule ^::OLD_APP_DIR::forum\.php$ ::APP_DIR::index.php?board-list/ [R=301,L]
#TODO: wsc RewriteCond %{QUERY_STRING} ^([0-9]+)-([^/\.]+)$ RewriteRule ^::OLD_APP_DIR::member\.php$ ::WSC_DIR::/index.php?user/%1-%2/ [R=301,L] RewriteRule ^::OLD_APP_DIR::online\.php$ ::WSC_DIR::/index.php?users-online-list/ [R=301,L] RewriteRule ^::OLD_APP_DIR::activity\.php$ ::WSC_DIR::/index.php?dashboard/ [R=301,L]

## Burning Board 2 RewriteCond %{QUERY_STRING} userid=([0-9]+) RewriteRule ^::OLD_APP_DIR::profile\.php$ index.php?user/%1/ [R=301,QSA,L] RewriteCond %{QUERY_STRING} goto=lastpost&threadid=([0-9]+) RewriteRule ^::OLD_APP_DIR::thread\.php$ ::APP_DIR::index.php?thread/%1/&action=lastPost [R=301,QSA,L] RewriteCond %{QUERY_STRING} threadid=([0-9]+)&goto=lastpost RewriteRule ^::OLD_APP_DIR::thread\.php$ ::APP_DIR::index.php?thread/%1/&action=lastPost [R=301,QSA,L] RewriteCond %{QUERY_STRING} postid=([0-9]+)#post([0-9]+) RewriteRule ^::OLD_APP_DIR::thread\.php$ ::APP_DIR::index.php?thread/&postID=%1#post%1 [NE,R=301,L] RewriteCond %{QUERY_STRING} postid=([0-9]+) RewriteRule ^::OLD_APP_DIR::thread\.php$ ::APP_DIR::index.php?thread/&postID=%1#post%1 [NE,R=301,L] RewriteCond %{QUERY_STRING} threadid=([0-9]+)page=([0-9]+) RewriteRule ^::OLD_APP_DIR::thread\.php$ ::APP_DIR::index.php?thread/%1/&pageNo=%2 [R=301,QSA,L] RewriteCond %{QUERY_STRING} threadid=([0-9]+) RewriteRule ^::OLD_APP_DIR::thread\.php$ ::APP_DIR::index.php?thread/%1/ [R=301,QSA,L] RewriteCond %{QUERY_STRING} boardid=([0-9]+)&daysprune=1000&sortfield=lastposttime&sortorder=DESC&page=([0-9]+) RewriteRule ^::OLD_APP_DIR::board\.php$ ::APP_DIR::index.php?board/%1/&pageNo=%2 [R=301,QSA,L] RewriteCond %{QUERY_STRING} boardid=([0-9]+) RewriteRule ^::OLD_APP_DIR::board\.php$ ::APP_DIR::index.php?board/%1/ [R=301,QSA,L]
#TODO: wsc RewriteCond %{QUERY_STRING} attachmentid=([0-9]+) RewriteRule ^::OLD_APP_DIR::attachment\.php$ ::WSC_DIR::/index.php?attachment/%1/ [R=301,QSA,L]
# Burning Board 2 Archiv RewriteRule ^::OLD_APP_DIR::archive/index\.html$ index.php?board-list/ [R=301,QSA,L] RewriteRule ^::OLD_APP_DIR::archive/([0-9]*)/board\.html$ ::APP_DIR::index.php?board/%1/ [R=301,QSA,L] RewriteRule ^::OLD_APP_DIR::archive/([0-9]*)/([0-9]*)/board\.html$ ::APP_DIR::index.php?board/%1/&pageNo=%2 [R=301,QSA,L] RewriteRule ^::OLD_APP_DIR::archive/([0-9]*)/thread\.html$ ::APP_DIR::index.php?thread/%1/ [R=301,QSA,L] RewriteRule ^::OLD_APP_DIR::archive/([0-9]*)/([0-9]*)/thread\.html$ ::APP_DIR::index.php?thread/%1/&pageNo=%2 [R=301,QSA,L]
